ISSUE.TITLE: follow button on 0.3?

I think it would basically be (in app.js): - insert follow button with JS variable `follow` (probably as a sibling to `#output`) - whenever websocket gets data scroll to bottom if follow is true (probably in the stdout.subscribe callback) - some css/less (position: fixed; right: 240px; bottom: 10px)
